post.body: How have I never tried Ritz crackers with ice cream? This is the best combo ever.
Today, I'm grateful for the Beatles. "Let It Be" always makes me feel better after a rough day.
After losing my internet connection in the middle of class, I realize how much I've taken WiFi and cellular data for granted. Hopefully we'll be done with remote learning soon!
The weather was lovely today! I can't wait for summer.
The Apple ecosystem keeps my life simple and productive. Everything just works.
I went on a five-mile hike today. The redwoods were beautiful ðŸŒ²
Someone stole my skateboard last night. I had some great times with it though. If I can't get it back, I guess I'll have to buy a new one.
Until I sprained my ankle today, I never realized how much I take it for granted. I'm also thankful for painkillers ðŸ¤ª
I'm tutoring for an Intro to Python course, and the students' curiosity and perseverance is really inspiring.
I wish I could see my friends in person, but at least we can keep in touch digitally. I've even made some new friends online, which is really cool.
Whoohoo, got my first dose! Huge thanks to our healthcare workers. The end of lockdown is near ðŸ’‰ðŸ’‰
I use a lot of open-source software, and it's really amazing how much work is done by unpaid volunteers. I have so much respect and gratitude for the efforts of these outstanding developers.
I almost left my hoodie behind at the park, but a complete stranger hollered at me to let me know. Thanks, whoever you are!
Huge shout out to everyone who contributes to Wikipedia! I had a lot of fun going down a Wikipedia rabbit hole today.
I had a great time surfing with @sharmaadvay0 today.
